bibl.title: Substitution of Strategus and Royal Scribe in the Roman Period.
bibl.note: "We still have to regard the Oslo papyrus inv. 1023 as good evidence of some kind of penthemeros in the Memphitic nome".

bibl.title: Actes du XVe Congrès International de Papyrologie. IV

bibl.seg: De Kat Eliassen Martha H., Substitution of Strategus and Royal Scribe in the Roman Period.
Actes du XVe Congrès International de Papyrologie. IV (Bruxelles, 1979) pp. 116-123.
"We still have to regard the Oslo papyrus inv. 1023 as good evidence of some kind of penthemeros in the Memphitic nome".
